# Copilot Instructions for Lie Counter

## Project Overview
This is a lie counter application that tracks and displays:
- Total number of lies since taking power
- Days since the last lie

## Technology Stack
- HTML5 for structure
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Vanilla JavaScript for logic
- GitHub Pages for deployment

## Code Style Guidelines
- Use semantic HTML5 elements
- Follow modern JavaScript (ES6+) conventions
- Use clear, descriptive variable and function names
- Add comments for complex logic
- Keep functions small and focused

## Testing
- Manually test all counter functionality
- Verify date calculations are accurate
- Ensure UI updates correctly

## Deployment
- This site is deployed via GitHub Pages
- All changes should be production-ready
